entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
